Name: A Good Snowman Is Hard To Build
About the game: A Good Snowman Is Hard To Build is an adorable puzzle game about being a monster and making snowmen. Adorable graphics by Benjamin Davis Featuring an enchanting original soundtrack by Priscilla Snow Lovingly-crafted puzzle design from Alan Hazelden, one of the creators of Sokobond Awards: Top 10 apps of 2016 - TIME magazine Best Character Design - Intel Level Up 2014 Official Selection - Develop Indie Showcase 2014 Official Selection - Screenshake 2015 Official Selection - BAFTA Inside Games Arcade 2015 Official Selection - Different Games Arcade 2015 Official Selection - Fantastic Arcade 2015
